text: Claire Nixon (born 14 November 1993) is a British water polo player. She competed for Great Britain in the 2013 World Aquatics Championships. She was born in Stafford, Staffordshire. She was educated at Great Wyrley High School. She played for the University of Hawaii's women's water polo team. == References == == Other websites == * Claire Nixon profile BBC Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:British water polo players Category:Sportspeople from Staffordshire
title: Claire Nixon
